segments.text: Welcome to our restaurant , Chez Attitude !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our reservation is under the name of Foster at 7:00 for four people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , Mr . Foster , our hostess will be with you in just a moment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We would like to begin with a cocktail while we are waiting . Would you tell the hostess to please come and let us know when our table is ready ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I will let her know where you are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The patio tables look really nice . Could we be seated there , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I could seat you right away at an outside table if you would like .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks ! We'll sit out there then . We will just order our drinks out there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , can I start you off with some cocktails while you are looking over the menu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , why don't you bring us a bottle of the house Chablis with four glasses to start with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll get on that right away !
segments.speaker: S1
